Plot: The story of 16-year-old Riyo who journeys to Hawaii in 1918 to marry a man she has never met, except through photographs and letters they have exchanged. Hoping to escape a troubled past ...
Title: Picture Bride
Writer: Kayo Hatta (screenplay), Kayo Hatta (story), Mari Hatta (screenplay), Mari Hatta (story), Diane Mei Lin Mark (story)
Actors: Yûki Kudô, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa, Tamlyn Tomita, Akira Takayama
